name: Resident Roller
description:
In Resident Roller you controll Roll-SPR, a revolutionary robot of the previous generation. After the factory you enjoy your retirement in is being decommissioned you need to escape it. Grab upgrades and assamble yoursef on the fly to get past 20 levels and discover one of two different endings!

Controls:

Arrows - movement

[Z] - Dash

[X] - Shoot

[R] - Reload level
